query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS shift_reports (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  shiftDate TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  shiftType ENUM('morning', 'afternoon', 'night') NOT NULL,
  shiftStart TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  shiftEnd TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  productionLineId INT,
  machineId INT,
  oee DECIMAL(5,2),
  availability DECIMAL(5,2),
  performance DECIMAL(5,2),
  quality DECIMAL(5,2),
  cpk DECIMAL(6,4),
  cp DECIMAL(6,4),
  ppk DECIMAL(6,4),
  totalProduced INT DEFAULT 0,
  goodCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  defectCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  plannedTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  actualRunTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  downtime INT DEFAULT 0,
  alertCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  spcViolationCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('generated', 'sent', 'failed') DEFAULT 'generated',
  sentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  sentTo TEXT,
  reportContent TEXT,
  reportFileUrl VARCHAR(500),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS shift_reports (

  cpk DECIMAL(6,4),
  cp DECIMAL(6,4),
  ppk DECIMAL(6,4),
  totalProduced INT DEFAULT 0,
  goodCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  defectCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  plannedTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  actualRunTime INT DEFAULT 0,
  downtime INT DEFAULT 0,
  alertCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  spcViolationCount INT DEFAULT 0,
  status ENUM('generated', 'sent', 'failed') DEFAULT 'generated',
  sentAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  sentTo TEXT,
  reportContent TEXT,
  reportFileUrl VARCHAR(500),
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
